mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoGodInq Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_INQ_SN , DSGN_GRP_NO , GOD_NO , INQ_TP_CD , MBR_NO , INQ_CSTMR_NM , INQ_CONT , INQ_DT , SECRETSNTNC_YN , ANS_STAT_CD , INQIRE_COUNT , PRCS_COMPT_DT , DELETE_YN , CSTMR_EMAIL , CSTMR_EMAIL_RECPTN_YN , LANG_CD , MALL_ID , DVC_CD , ANS_EVL_CD , ANS_EVL_CONT , ANS_EVL_WRITNG_DT , ANS_EVL_ADMIN_ANS_CONT , ANS_EVL_ADMIN_ANS_DT , STPLAT_IEM_AGR_YN , STPLAT_CD , UTID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_GOD_INQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_INQ_SN = #{godInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoGodInq Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_GOD_INQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_INQ_SN = #{godInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
